org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.impl

Class ChartBackgroundColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractPlugin
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.impl.ChartBackgroundColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin

    public final class ChartBackgroundColor
extends AbstractPlugin
    Default plugin implementation to set the background color of chart.
    If added to defaults, without any configuration, the chart will have a WHITE background color.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor()

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Plugins must define a unique id in order to be configurable.
        Returns the plugin id. A plugin id
        • can not start with a dot or an underscore
        • can not contain any non-URL-safe characters
        • cannot contain uppercase letters
        • should be something short, but also reasonably descriptive
        Returns:
        the plugin id.

      • onBeforeDraw

        public boolean onBeforeDraw(AbstractChart<?,?> chart,
                            double easing,
                            com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject options)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Called before drawing 'chart' at every animation frame specified by the given easing value. If any plugin returns false, the frame drawing is cancelled until another 'render' is triggered.
        Specified by:
        onBeforeDraw in interface Plugin
        Overrides:
        onBeforeDraw in class AbstractPlugin
        Parameters:
        chart - The chart instance.
        easing - The current animation value, between 0.0 and 1.0.
        options - plugin options set by user into chart options.
        Returns:
        false to cancel the chart drawing.
